body_html:
I have the similar segfault when I run cifar10_eval.py. My env is python3.5, CUDA7.5 with cuDNN 5, tensorflow 0.9, ubuntu 14.04. When I ran the code with tf 0.8, it was fine.

When I run gdb with the code. I've got the segfault as below:
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007fffebbc0011 in perftools::gputools::StreamExecutor::DeviceMemoryUsage(long long_, long long_) const ()
from /opt/conda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so

Anyone knows how to fix this?

body:
I have the similar segfault when I run cifar10_eval.py. My env is python3.5, CUDA7.5 with cuDNN 5, tensorflow 0.9, ubuntu 14.04. When I ran the code with tf 0.8, it was fine. 

When I run gdb with the code. I've got the segfault as below:
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007fffebbc0011 in perftools::gputools::StreamExecutor::DeviceMemoryUsage(long long_, long long_) const ()
   from /opt/conda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so

Anyone knows how to fix this?
